pve.title: PvE: Sustain Frontline (Frontline + Sustain + CC + Tempo + Double Carry)
pve.description:
• Structure: Double frontline stabilizes early fights and protects the backline.
• Sustain: Healing/shields/lifesteal improve consistency in extended fights.
• Control: Multiple CC tools enable reliable chain setups and deny enemy tempo.
• Tempo → Damage: Energy/CDR/haste engines accelerate ult cycles and create kill windows.

formationNotes.note: Main frontline holder (tank/taunt) to stabilize the early fight.
Lower-pressure lane to reduce early focus and preserve team stability.
Backline slot to reduce early focus and maintain consistent output.
Support/backline utility position to keep buffs/heals safe.
Damage dealer kept backline to maximize uptime and avoid early collapse.

pve.formationSummary: Formation optimized to protect backline and stabilize the early fight.
pve.winCondition: Tempo engines accelerate ultimate rotations, enabling repeated burst windows and fast carry conversion.
pve.danger: Avoid giving the enemy an uncontested first engage and respect pressure lanes.
strongVs: Excels against teams that rely on delayed scaling without early tempo tools.
Control chains gain maximum value against teams lacking reliable cleanse tools.
Sustain + collapse pressure neutralizes slow attrition compositions.
